title: What are the factors that affect the standby time of the battery?
answer:
a. Calling, activating the back light, and playing games will consume more battery. As the call time increases, the standby time will be shortened.
b. The standby time in an “Out of Service” area will be longer than the standard standby time.
c. The performance of the battery varies with the changes of the charging state, temperature, local radio signals and state of the back light.
